PAPIER-MACHE DUCKS.

The Papier-Mache duck is one of the traditional animals done by Kashmir artisans, which can be kept as a shelf decor, storage box or the most unique gift to the one you love.The insides of the duck are done in a glossy black finish which can be used for storage purposes.

Material:
    Mashed Paper, Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Unique gift Item, can be used for storage purpose.
Sizes:
    3’’.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

PAPIER-MACHE ARABIAN FLASK

PAPIER-MACHE ARABIAN FLASK

Aside from the traditional Papier-Mache crafts, which are the signature of the Artisans of Kashmir, the contemporary designs are now taking a huge market share of the same art telling a story in itself, a story of keeping alive the beautiful Paper Mache Art of Kashmir. Take it for yourself or gift it to someone you love. Inspired by the thought of valley’s best craftsman, handpicked is a Paper Mache ARABIAN FLASK, put together in a unique pattern, featuring the rich fauna of the valley. Use as shelf decor, or as a gift for that special someone.

PAPIER-MACHE BOOK COVER.

PAPIER-MACHE BOOK COVER.

This PAPIER-MACHE BOOK COVER fits a standard size hard back Anonymous Big Book. Made of the finest Papier-Mache outer surface and finished velvet interior, this cover is hand carved and hand tooled. Keep your precious book safe in our beautiful book covers.
